title: Wygoda, Gmina Parchowo
text:
Wygoda is a <a href="human%20settlement">settlement</a> in the administrative district of <a href="Gmina%20Parchowo">Gmina Parchowo</a>, within <a href="Byt%C3%B3w%20County">Bytów County</a>, <a href="Pomeranian%20Voivodeship">Pomeranian Voivodeship</a>, in northern Poland. It lies approximately south of <a href="Parchowo">Parchowo</a>, east of <a href="Byt%C3%B3w">Bytów</a>, and west of the regional capital <a href="Gda%C5%84sk">Gdańsk</a>.
For details of the history of the region, see "<a href="History%20of%20Pomerania">History of Pomerania</a>".
The settlement has a population of 45.
References.
